about_the_game:
This is a game that offers deep immersion, allowing for development akin to that of a child, without the fear of making mistakes or facing judgments. It is an interactive and immersive tool, providing English language learning through training and task simulations, creating a rich learning environment with varied stimuli and progressive changes, approaching the real-life experience. Unlike traditional approaches, this learning tool does not adhere strictly to grammatical rigidity before mastery of the language, much like how we learn our mother tongue.

This game presents itself as a valuable aid tool for educators who have the challenging task of introducing grammatical norms to students without complete mastery of the language, respecting the natural order of knowledge and adapting to each student's individual stage, becoming a valuable ally in the educational process.
